page.title: 02CARRIE-ANN PRIOR'S DAY
page.content: ONE DAY I GOT UP.THEN I GOT MY POCKET MONEY AND WENT TO THE PAPER SHOP.I BOUGHT SOME SWEETS AND A PAPER FOR DAD.THEN I WENT DOWN THE FIELDS WITH MY FRIENDS.AFTER THAT I WENT OVER THE RECREATION GROUND.I PLAYED ON THE SWINGS.AFTER THAT I WENT TO THE CHURCH AND PUT SOME FLOWERS ON MY BROTHERS GRAVE.THEN I WENT INSIDE.LATER I WENT FISHING IN THE BROOK.AT THE BROOK THERE WERE LOTS OF TREES AND I CLIMBED SOME OF THEM.THEN I WENT HOME AND HAD TEA. SOON I WENT OUT AGAIN AND PLAYED ON THE GREEN IT WAS QUITE MUDDY. THEN I PLAYED 40 40 SCAT AND HID IN THE ALLEY WAY.HANSLOPE IS NOT VERY BUSY.IT IS VERY QUIET AND SAFE FOR ME TO PLAY OUT.I'VE LIVED HERE FOR SEVEN YEARS AND I LOVE IT HERE.
